name: Trunk Rotation With Cable
how_to_perform:
# Trunk Rotation With Cable

## Instructions

1. Stand facing a cable machine with the cable at chest height and parallel to your body.
2. Hold each handle of the cable with both hands, keeping your elbows slightly bent and your arms straight out in front of you.
3. Engage your core muscles by drawing your belly button towards your spine.
4. Rotate your trunk to one side, keeping your upper arms and shoulders still, while maintaining a slight bend in your elbows.
5. Hold the rotation for a brief pause and then return to the starting position.
6. Repeat on the other side, rotating to the opposite direction with control and precision.
7. Perform 8-12 repetitions on each side.
short_summary: Trunk Rotation With Cable is an exercise that targets the obliques by using a cable machine to create resistance as the user rotates their trunk.
